tool.name: PhyloWGS Tool Input Prep

param.name: run
param.label: Run Subsampling
param.help: Subsample SSMs to reduce PhyloWGS runtime

param.name: cnvs
param.help: CNVs extracted from Battenberg file using PhyloWGS CNVs Prep

param.name: only_normal_cn
param.label: Only report CN regions
param.help: Only output variants lying in normal CN regions. Do not output CNV data directly.

param.name: cnv_confidence
param.help: Confidence in CNVs. Set to < 1 to scale 'd' values

param.name: read_length
param.help: Approximate length of reads. Used to calculate confidence in CNV frequencies (default: 100)

tool.help: * Second tool to be executed when using the PhyloWGS example. * Extracts SSMs from a VCF file and formats CNVs from a CNV text file. * More information on this tool can be found at https://github.com/morrislab/phylowgs/tree/master/parser under create_phylowgs_inputs.py * Output of this tool will be used in PhyloWGS_Tool tool.
